description: Date and time the system logged the KPI update event.
Data table whose fleet KPIs were recalculated during this update.
Elapsed processing time for the KPI recalculation, measured in milliseconds.
JSON metadata describing the update, including affected KPI groups (e.g., work requests, work orders, assets); exact schema likely varies; confirm with SME.
User or service account that triggered the KPI recalculation.
